title: Force causing motion from momentum equation

content.prompt: The momentum p of a moving object as a function of time t is given by the expression p = kt3, where k is a constant. The force causing this motion is given by the expression

choices.label: 3 k t 2 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DDE@

k t 2 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D22@

k t 4 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D25@

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
